rows.label: qev050201_MSG0001
rows.name: She is truly gone. How powerless I am...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0002
rows.name: ...Mmm? Yes, stranger? Are you a BLADE, perhaps?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0003
rows.name:
Please, I beg of you, do not look at me.
My very existence is a mark of shame upon my family.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_JNK0010
rows.name: Stare

rows.label: qev050201_SEL0011
rows.name: Look all the more intently at the poor Wrothian.

rows.label: qev050201_JNK0020
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev050201_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask the Wrothian why he is so sad.

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0004
rows.name: Wh-why do you look at me so?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0005
rows.name: Ah! Are you saying I must not run away?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0006
rows.name:
How right you are. No matter how weak or shameful I
may be, I must do as my brothers bade me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0007
rows.name: Will you bring my sister back to me, kind human?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0008
rows.name: It would not be right to speak of this to an outsider.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0009
rows.name:
...But no. This is not the time for keeping up
appearances.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0010
rows.name:
I hear that you BLADEs are all formidable warriors.
In that case, I would beg a boon of you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0011
rows.name: Will you bring my sister back to me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0012
rows.name:
I am called Zo Langra. My older sister, Zo Zazhi, left
New LA in order to slay the Ganglion assassin who
claimed the lives of our brothers.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0013
rows.name:
She is strong, my sister. Stronger even than most
Wrothians, which is no idle boast.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0014
rows.name:
But the killer she faces is a monster of even greater
power.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_JNK0030
rows.name: Probe

rows.label: qev050201_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask to hear more about Zo Langra's sister.

rows.label: qev050201_JNK0040
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev050201_SEL0041
rows.name:
Ask Zo Langra what sort of
enemy his sister is up against.

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0015
rows.name:
She received training in the sword from our three older
brothers since early childhood.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0016
rows.name:
She could cut down most warriors without taking
a single blow.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0017
rows.name: But in this case, even such skill will not be enough.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0018
rows.name:
The same three brothers who taught her attacked this
killer all at once, and they still could not match him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0019
rows.name:
All who have encountered this assassin have paid with
their lives—my three elder brothers included.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0020
rows.name:
As such, his appearance is known to no one.
All we have are the results of his frightful strength.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0021
rows.name:
The dastard has made a career of gleefully cutting
down Wrothians at the Ganglion's behest.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0022
rows.name:
If my sister is not stopped, she will meet the same end
that my brothers did, and vengeance will be none the
closer.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0023
rows.name:
Please, brave BLADE. You must calm the rage within
Zo Zazhi and bring her back to the city.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0024
rows.name: I beg you to save the last princess of the House of Zo![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0025
rows.name:
Thank you. Though it shames me greatly to say it,
the fate of my house lies entirely in your hands.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0026
rows.name:
My sister departed after hearing that the killer whom
she seeks had been sighted entering the Ant's Nest
in Oblivia.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0027
rows.name:
I ask that you find her before the bright flame of her
life is extinguished.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0028
rows.name:
Despite her slight frame and sweet appearance,
my sister, Zo Zazhi, possesses the raw strength to
bring even one of my size to their knees.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0029
rows.name:
Ideally, you can persuade her to return home through
peaceful means.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0030
rows.name:
But if force is the only way, then so be it.
Do as you must to bring her home.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0031
rows.name:
It saddens me to think of Zo Zazhi being hurt,
but far better a temporary wound than to lose
her as I have my brothers.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0032
rows.name:
Thank you, warrior! It is because of you that Zazhi
returned home safely.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0033
rows.name:
I must confess, I am impressed to hear that you bested
her in single combat.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0034
rows.name:
Were my brothers still alive, I am certain they would
have welcomed you as both friend and rival.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_JNK0050
rows.name: Offer Sympathy

rows.label: qev050201_SEL0051
rows.name:
Say that you wish you could
have met Zo Langra's brothers.

rows.label: qev050201_JNK0060
rows.name: Offer Reality

rows.label: qev050201_SEL0061
rows.name:
Tell Zo Langra that there is no
use wishing for the impossible.

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0035
rows.name:
Wherever they now rest, I am sure they are pleased
to hear it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0036
rows.name:
I, too, must work hard to become a warrior worthy of
their acceptance.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0037
rows.name:
You speak truth. Perhaps my reliance on such sweet
fantasies is the reason I have failed to grow strong.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0038
rows.name:
I shall strive to reinvent myself as a warrior fit to protect
my sister and avenge my brothers.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0039
rows.name:
I ask that you accept this in the meantime,
as heartfelt thanks from the House of Zo.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0040
rows.name: Did you find her? Is my sister safe?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0041
rows.name: ...What?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0042
rows.name: She insisted that she would not turn back?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0043
rows.name:
I see. I knew from the start that it would not be easy
to change her mind.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0044
rows.name:
If only there were some way to make her understand
how the rest of our house felt.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0045
rows.name:
My brothers ever strove to protect her. I am certain they
would not wish for her to die avenging them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_JNK0070
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev050201_SEL0071
rows.name:
Ask Zo Langra if there is a way
to communicate their wishes.

rows.label: qev050201_JNK0080
rows.name: Suggest

rows.label: qev050201_SEL0081
rows.name: Tell Zo Langra that force is the only option.

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0046
rows.name:
When teaching her, my brothers made a point of
saying the sword was not a tool made to kill others,
but one crafted so that she herself might live.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0047
rows.name:
Perhaps if she were shown the swords they left behind,
she might remember those words.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0048
rows.name:
Many thanks for your aid. Please take these three
swords to her at once.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0049
rows.name:
I suppose that is ultimately inevitable.
But first, I would hear her mind.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0050
rows.name:
Might I impose on you to take these three swords and
speak with her a second time?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0051
rows.name:
They are the blades my brothers left behind. My hope is
that she will remember their words when she sees them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0052
rows.name:
They often said their lessons in the sword were not so
she might kill others, but that she herself might live.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0053
rows.name: Surely she will see that if you go to her and...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0054
rows.name: S-Sister! What is it?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0055
rows.name:
I have tracked him to his den at last, my brother.
The craven cowers inside the Jair Fortress,
and I go there now to end this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0056
rows.name:
Zazhi, wait! If his location is known, why not assemble
a force to—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0057
rows.name: A force of humans? Never![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0058
rows.name:
Vengeance for the House of Zo will be taken by the
House of Zo. That is the Wrothian way.
Or have you forgotten this, Zo Langra?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0059
rows.name:
But he killed all three of our brothers!
Rush into a duel with him, and you shall surely die![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0060
rows.name:
No true warrior fears death! You are heir to the
House of Zo—where is your pride?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0061
rows.name: I shall return once I have avenged our brothers.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0062
rows.name: Sister... They only ever wished for you to live.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0063
rows.name: I am sorry. Please take the swords and hurry after her.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0064
rows.name: Remind her of her brothers' wishes. Save her life.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0065
rows.name:
Those blades are steeped deep in the wishes of my
brothers.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0066
rows.name:
I have faith my sister will remember their words once
she looks upon them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0067
rows.name:
Please go and speak with her once more,
before that monster claims her life as well.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0068
rows.name:
Zo Zazhi has come home!
It is all thanks to your kind efforts.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0069
rows.name:
Though I fear she still refuses to hear my words,
and those of our late brothers.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0070
rows.name:
But I know now what I must do. I shall grow strong.
Strong enough to either protect her or quiet her rage
as you did.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0071
rows.name:
And one day, I will take revenge with my own hands.
That is my role as a son of the House of Zo![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_JNK0090
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev050201_SEL0091
rows.name: Support Zo Langra in his commitment.

rows.label: qev050201_JNK0100
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: qev050201_SEL0101
rows.name: Explain that vengeance is a meaningless pursuit.

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0072
rows.name: Your words stoke the fire within me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0073
rows.name:
I do not know when it will be, for I am still too weak
to best even my sister in a match.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0074
rows.name:
But I will train with all my heart until they day I storm
the Jair Fortress and take this assassin's life.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0075
rows.name:
Perhaps. But so long as the assassin lives,
Zo Zazhi will seek it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0076
rows.name:
Especially now that his whereabouts are known.
As a son of the House of Zo, I cannot sit idly by.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0077
rows.name:
I know it will take time. But I will train with all my
heart until the day I am able to storm Jair Fortress
and fulfill my duty.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0078
rows.name:
I thank you for all you have done. Know that the
House of Zo will not forget this debt.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0079
rows.name: Please accept this humble token of our gratitude.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0080
rows.name:
Zazhi has come home!
It is all thanks to your kind efforts.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0081
rows.name:
Though I fear she still refuses to hear my words,
and those of our late brothers.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0082
rows.name:
But I know now what I must do. I shall grow strong.
Strong enough to either protect her or quiet her rage
as you did.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0083
rows.name:
And one day, I will take revenge with my own hands.
That is my role as a son of the Hou—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0084
rows.name: Wh-what?! You have already defeated him?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0085
rows.name: And you had already done so much for us...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0086
rows.name:
Thank you. Truly. The House of Zo will never forget
this debt. I shall see to that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050201_MSG0087
rows.name: Please accept this humble token of our gratitude.[ST:wait ]
